scripts.release: npm run release-mapboxgl && npm run release-ol && npm run release-leaflet
scripts.release-mapboxgl: npm run release-mapboxgl-es5 && npm run release-mapboxgl-es6
scripts.release-mapboxgl-es5: cross-env moduleVersion=es5 npm run deploy-mapboxgl ./src/mapboxgl/index.js ./src/mapboxgl/css/index.js && uglifyjs ./dist/mapboxgl/ekmap-mapboxgl.js  --ecma 5 --comments /Copyright©/i -c -m -o ./dist/mapboxgl/ekmap-mapboxgl.min.js && cleancss -o  ./dist/mapboxgl/ekmap-mapboxgl.min.css ./dist/mapboxgl/ekmap-mapboxgl.css
scripts.release-mapboxgl-es6: cross-env moduleVersion=es6 npm run deploy-mapboxgl ./src/mapboxgl/index.js ./src/mapboxgl/css/index.js && node ./node_modules/uglify-es/bin/uglifyjs ./dist/mapboxgl/ekmap-mapboxgl-es6.js  --ecma 6 --comments /Copyright©/i -c -m -o ./dist/mapboxgl/ekmap-mapboxgl-es6.min.js && cleancss -o  ./dist/mapboxgl/ekmap-mapboxgl.min.css ./dist/mapboxgl/ekmap-mapboxgl.css
scripts.release-ol: npm run release-ol-es5 && npm run release-ol-es6
scripts.release-ol-es5: cross-env moduleVersion=es5 npm run deploy-ol ./src/openlayers/namespace.js ./src/openlayers/css/index.js  && uglifyjs ./dist/ol/ekmap-ol.js  --ecma 5 --comments /Copyright©/i -c -m -o ./dist/ol/ekmap-ol.min.js && cleancss -o  ./dist/ol/ekmap-ol.min.css ./dist/ol/ekmap-ol.css
scripts.release-ol-es6: cross-env moduleVersion=es6 npm run deploy-ol ./src/openlayers/namespace.js ./src/openlayers/css/index.js  && node ./node_modules/uglify-es/bin/uglifyjs ./dist/ol/ekmap-ol-es6.js  --ecma 6 --comments /Copyright©/i -c -m -o ./dist/ol/ekmap-ol-es6.min.js && cleancss -o  ./dist/ol/ekmap-ol.min.css ./dist/ol/ekmap-ol.css
scripts.release-leaflet: npm run release-leaflet-es5 && npm run release-leaflet-es6
scripts.release-leaflet-es5: cross-env moduleVersion=es5 npm run deploy-leaflet ./src/leaflet/index.js ./src/leaflet/css/index.js && uglifyjs ./dist/leaflet/ekmap-leaflet.js  --ecma 5 --comments /Copyright©/i -c -m -o ./dist/leaflet/ekmap-leaflet.min.js && cleancss -o  ./dist/leaflet/ekmap-leaflet.min.css ./dist/leaflet/ekmap-leaflet.css
scripts.release-leaflet-es6: cross-env moduleVersion=es6 npm run deploy-leaflet ./src/leaflet/index.js ./src/leaflet/css/index.js && node ./node_modules/uglify-es/bin/uglifyjs ./dist/leaflet/ekmap-leaflet-es6.js  --ecma 6 --comments /Copyright©/i -c -m -o ./dist/leaflet/ekmap-leaflet-es6.min.js && cleancss -o  ./dist/leaflet/ekmap-leaflet.min.css ./dist/leaflet/ekmap-leaflet.css
scripts.build-docs: npm run build-docs-mapboxgl && npm run build-docs-ol && npm run build-docs-leaflet
scripts.publish: npm run pre-publish && npm publish && cd ../mapboxgl && npm publish && cd ../ol && npm publish && cd ../leaflet && npm publish
